statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityScans;
SELECT scan_name, scan_timestamp FROM SecurityScans WHERE vulnerabilities_found > 10;
SELECT scan_id, scan_name, vulnerabilities_found FROM SecurityScans WHERE scan_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM SecurityScans ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT scan_name, scan_status FROM SecurityScans WHERE scan_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM SecurityScans WHERE vulnerabilities_found > 10 ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT scan_id, scan_name, scan_status FROM SecurityScans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' ORDER BY scan_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT scan_status FROM SecurityScans WHERE vulnerabilities_found < 5;
SELECT scan_id, scan_name, scan_timestamp FROM SecurityScans WHERE scan_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT AVG(vulnerabilities_found) AS avg_vulnerabilities FROM SecurityScans;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT scan_id, scan_name, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT scan_name FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation FROM vulnerability_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_results->>'status' = 'high';
SELECT scan_name, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT scan_name, scan_results->'vulnerability_count' AS total_vulnerabilities FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation, recommendation_date FROM vulnerability_recommendations WHERE scan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT scan_name, scan_results->'critical_vulnerabilities' AS critical_vulnerabilities_count FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_results->'critical_vulnerabilities' IS NOT NULL;

SELECT scan_name, scan_date, jsonb_array_elements(scan_results->'vulnerabilities')->>'severity' AS vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vulnerability_severity ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_scans
SELECT scan_name, scan_date FROM security_scans WHERE vulnerabilities_found > 10
SELECT result_description, result_date FROM scan_results ORDER BY result_date DESC
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_severity >= 3
SELECT scan_name, vulnerabilities_found, scan_date FROM security_scans ORDER BY scan_date
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_severity > 5
SELECT scan_id, COUNT(vulnerability_id) AS total_vulnerabilities FROM scan_results GROUP BY scan_id
SELECT s.scan_name, COUNT(sr.result_id) AS total_results FROM security_scans s JOIN scan_results sr ON s.scan_id = sr.scan_id GROUP BY s.scan_name
SELECT vr.result_description, v.vulnerability_name FROM scan_results sr JOIN vulnerabilities v ON sr.vulnerability_id = v.vulnerability_id JOIN scan_results vr ON sr.result_id = vr.result_id
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_type FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, risk_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT result_status, result_description FROM scan_results WHERE result_status = 'Failed' ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_type = 'Web Application' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, risk_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE risk_level = 'High' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Administrator';
SELECT vulnerability_name, exploitability FROM vulnerabilities WHERE exploitability = 'High' ORDER BY vulnerability_name ASC;
SELECT result_id, result_status, result_description FROM scan_results WHERE result_status = 'Detected';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT scan_name, scan_type FROM scans ORDER BY scan_type DESC;
SELECT report_name, findings_count FROM reports WHERE create_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT * FROM scans ORDER BY scan_name DESC;
SELECT finding_name, scan_name FROM findings JOIN scans ON findings.scan_id = scans.scan_id WHERE findings.vulnerability_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='admin';
SELECT report_name, findings_count FROM reports WHERE create_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY findings_count DESC;
